name: Fiowind-Resume
body:
#Fiona Zhou **Front-End Develop**
Shanghai, China ##Education ####Zhejiang University of Technology, Hangzhou, China, 2010–2014 * B.Eng. in Computer Science ##Experience ###Dianrong Inc. Shanghai, China , May 2015 -- Now #####Front End Developer * Front and back separation，I develop the front end with react in the store app and forum app which have high QPS.Then do the front end optimization.（keyword：reflux，gulp，webpack，react，stylus） * Develop the front web of a combination frame with PHP，and develop the Front end template in the web app which use PHP. * Develop lots of H5 used in wechat.In these cases,development that included Javascript, HTML, CSS, React, Nodejs, Mysql, ImageMagick, and always webpack packing tool. * Structure the isomorphic frame which JavaScript applications that can run both client-side and server-side，the backend and frontend share the same code. * Develop some middle applications which use nodejs and react. ###800Best.com, Hangzhou, China, May 2014 -- September 2014 #####Web Developer * Develop the account web application with flex and Java with SSH2 frame in a developer group with 5 people,I focus on the front developing and many data's transaction processing. * Coding some algorithm with C++ which impove the express delivery ###Anheng Inc. Hangzhou, China, May 2013 -- December 2013 #####Web security researcher&Security penetration * Reserach the web security, mainly about SQL injection,XSS,CSRF，File upload etc.Test Common Vulnerability and try to scored servers to get higher privileges * Depend on new vulnerabilities,code the poc to verification of customer service and code the exp program to Mock attacks.In these cases, I use the language Python. ###Yilao Inc. Hangzhou,China, May 2012 -- May 2013 ##### Web Developer(Full-Stack) * Develop a Chemicals Manual Automatic Generation Web System.Back-end I use Django,and front-end I use jQuery and bootstrap, Database I use Mysql,and server is centos. ##Skills * Markup Language: Markdown & HTML5 * Styling: CSS3 & SCSS/SASS * Scripting: Javascript/jQuery * Frameworks: ReactJS & Angular * React Frameworks: Redux & Relux & Refluxible * Browser Tools: Chrome API * APIs: REST + JSON Protocol * Version Control: Git/Github * JS Bundlers: Webpack & Gulp * Testing: Jasmine & Chakram * CMS: Blogger & Wordpress * Backend: NodeJs, Python * Code Editor: Sublime ##Links * Email: fiowind.zfx@gmail.com * Github: https://github.com/fiowind * phone: (+86) 13122713969 * Wechat: fiowind
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
